channel.title: My server on runelocus says offline and my server is online
channel.description:
I.puttes my server on.runelocus. and it says offline but i putted my server online and.it still says offline what did i wrong?????
Plz help!!

item.title: My server on runelocus says offline and my server is online
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

tyb97:

Is this a troll? Or do you not know how to ask questions?

He is trying to post his server on a different server status than mopars, The sites name is filtered to google though.

You most likely need to port forward your router to reach your computer. Try looking for the brand name and version on your router. Then search http://portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/routerindex.htm for a tutorial on it. They have some great tutorials for port forwarding

Read full topic
item.source: My server on runelocus says offline and my server is online
